summary: Hattem is a municipality and a city in the eastern Netherlands.
full_text:
Hattem  is a municipality and a city in the eastern Netherlands. The municipality had a population of 11,739 in 2014. The municipality includes the hamlet of 't Zand.
^ "Burgemeester Jan Willem Wiggers"  . Gemeente Hattem. Retrieved 6 July 2014. 
^ "Kerncijfers wijken en buurten" . CBS Statline . CBS. 2 July 2013. Retrieved 12 March 2014. 
^ "Postcodetool for 8051EZ". Actueel Hoogtebestand Nederland . Het Waterschapshuis. Retrieved 6 July 2014. 
^ "Bevolkingsontwikkeling; regio per maand" . CBS Statline . CBS. 26 June 2014. Retrieved 24 July 2014.
title: Hattem
